rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Earth was destroyed after getting caught
in a battle between aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0002
rows.name: At that time, humanity should have shared its fate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0003
rows.name: Is that your true feeling!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Then why did you participate in the
Earth Life Colonization Project, Lao-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0005
rows.name: Why did you become a crew member of the White Whale![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0006
rows.name: Because I believed that plan would save all of humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
No... it was obvious to everyone that saving
all ten billion humans was impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0008
rows.name: But even so... race, nationality, religion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
I believed the desire to save people
across those barriers was genuine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
That's why the world lent its power
to the Earth Life Colonization Project![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0011
rows.name: That is[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0012
rows.name: But in reality[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0013
rows.name:
It was a plan to gather the power and wealth of the whole world,
only to let the [System:Ruby rt=elite ]humans[/System:Ruby] of the nations holding the initiative escape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0015
rows.name: Do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0016
rows.name:
The only ordinary people of different nationalities
or races who got on the White Whale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0017
rows.name: Were just us, gathered as crew to maintain the immigrant ship.[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0018
rows.name:
The many others... the immigrant group
currently sleeping in the Central Life...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0019
rows.name: Were people chosen to be chosen from the very beginning![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0020
rows.name: That's[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0021
rows.name: Elma, you knew, didn't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0022
rows.name: I won't say there weren't people chosen arbitrarily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Even so, I cooperated because I thought it was
a more meaningful plan than doing nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0024
rows.name: Nationality, race, wealth, talent...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Those walls that separate people are
merely things defined by people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0026
rows.name: If you look at the genetic level, it's only a very slight difference.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0027
rows.name: It's not just a slight difference! Not to Earthlings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0028
rows.name: You wouldn't be able to understand, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0030
rows.name: No... there's no need to lump "Earthlings" together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0031
rows.name: This is my emotion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0032
rows.name: Even if only a handful of people were to be saved...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0033
rows.name: Saying humanity should have perished along with the Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0033_2
rows.name: That's not like you at all, Lao-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0034
rows.name: It's strange![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0035
rows.name: Lin... my wife and daughter[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0035_2
rows.name: They died when the Earth was destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0037
rows.name: Earth, humanity... it doesn't matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0038
rows.name:
I participated in the Earth Life Colonization
Project to save my family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0039
rows.name:
No... there was no guarantee that my family
would be chosen just because I participated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0040
rows.name:
If they weren't chosen and were fated to disappear...
then when that time came[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0040_2
rows.name: We vowed to accept it with calm hearts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0041
rows.name:
But still, there was hope, however slight!
The hope that they might be chosen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0042
rows.name: I bet on that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0043
rows.name: But the upper echelons of the project, from the start...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Had no intention of choosing the handful of people
to be saved from the whole world![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0044_02
rows.name: Just to save the [System:Ruby rt=elite ]humans[/System:Ruby] of their own countries, they...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0045
rows.name: That's wrong, Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0046
rows.name: What is wrong! How is it wrong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0047
rows.name:
I'm the only one who survived...
There was no hope from the beginning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0048
rows.name: I couldn't do anything for Charmaine or Chenshi![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Can you understand my feelings upon
learning that truth afterwards!? Can you understand our feelings!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Even if it was a plan to arbitrarily save
only a portion of Earthlings...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0051
rows.name: It is better than saving no one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0052
rows.name: That is my way of thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0053
rows.name: So, Lao[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0053_2
rows.name:
Your feelings that drive you to lend your strength to the Growth,
who are trying to destroy the people who were saved...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0054
rows.name: I cannot sympathize with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0062
rows.name: That's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0062_2
rows.name: I'm not expecting anyone to understand![ST:wait ]
